description:
Robin, Usopp, the Tontatta`s and the others make moves to rejoin Luffy as Doflamingo`s deadly game rages on! Meanwhile, Kin`emon makes it to the trash heap in his search for his friend Kanjuro - just as Pica emerges in the town and changes the stakes of the game!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daichi Meidou: Hakai Kami Kyoudai Pica Kourin
La Terre et le Ciel ébranlés. Pica le géant destructeur !
With a Rumbling of the Ground! The God of Destruction - Giant Pica Descends!
Сотрясая землю. Появление Пики - гигантского Бога-разрушителя
بزمجرة من الأرض! إله الدّمار، ينزل بيكا العملاق!
大地鳴動 破壊神巨大ピーカ降臨
